attributes.action: Change the VAT status on bicycle sales to make them exempt.
attributes.additional_details: The cycle to work scheme is very successful but is limited to people who have the benefit of a participating employer, the main benefit is he VAT zero rating, this should be available to all.
attributes.background: Extended the VAT exemption on bikes sales given to employed people under the cycle to work scheme to all by removing the VAT on new bike sales.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327683
